subject: Wholesale Cannabis Program - Honest Pharmco
body:
Hi {name},

I'm David with Honest Pharmco. We're launching our wholesale program and wanted to share current inventory.

We have 500+ lbs available across multiple strains, including Red Velvet, Orange Cream Pop, and OG Pound Cake.

Pricing starts at $550 per pound and varies by strain, quantity, and availability. Delivery is available within 24 hours.

If you're interested, please don't hesitate to reach out for the full inventory, current pricing, or to schedule a call.

Thank you,
David
Honest Pharmco
(585) 519-9778 | david@honestpharmco.com | honestpharmco.com
